CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The intrinsic properties of PCDSeBT are not only characterized by UV - vis absorption , cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) , and organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) but also the surface morphology , mobilities of space charge - limited current ( SCLC ) model , and polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) in its bulkheterojunction ( BHJ ) active layer with [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) are evaluated in detail.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |
| UV - vis absorption |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) |
| bulkheterojunction ( BHJ ) |

Explanation:

* PCDSeBT: A type of organic semiconductor material.
* UV - vis absorption: A property of materials that refers to the absorption of ultraviolet and visible light.
* [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ): A fullerene derivative used as an electron acceptor material in organic solar cells.
* bulkheterojunction ( BHJ ): A type of heterojunction used in organic solar cells, consisting of intermixed electron donor and electron acceptor materials.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) |

Explanation:

* PCDSeBT: A type of organic semiconductor material.
* [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ): A fullerene derivative used as an electron acceptor material in organic solar cells.

The other entities in the original paragraph, such as "UV - vis absorption", "surface morphology", "mobilities of space charge - limited current ( SCLC ) model", and "polymer solar cells ( PSCs )" are not material names, but rather properties, methods, or applications related to materials.
